name: Frightfur Shark
text:
2 "Fluffal" and/or "Edge Imp" monsters
This card is also treated as a Fusion Monster whilst on the field or in the GY. If this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Fluffal" or "Edge Imp" monster from your Deck to a zone this card points to but it’s effects are negated. When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap card or effect: You can return 1 "Frightfur" monster you control to the Extra Deck and if you do negate that effect and destroy that card. If this card is sent to the GY as a Fusion Material for the Fusion Summon of a "Frightfur" monster: return 1 card on the field to its owner’s hand. You can only use each effect of "Frightfur Shark" once per turn.
